WelcomeAboutMeContent: My name is Arnaud Michel, I am a full-stack web developer. I am currently in my second year of Computer Science at the IUT Robert Schumann (Illkirch-Graffenstaden). I started learning web development in 2019, and since then, I have not stopped learning and improving. I created this website to showcase my projects, skills, and journey.
HighSchoolDescription: I obtained my high school diploma in 2022 from Gustave Courbet High School in Belfort. I chose mathematics as my specialty and computer science as an option. I graduated with honors.
CollegeDescription: I am currently in my second year of Computer Science at the IUT Robert Schumann (Illkirch-Graffenstaden).
SuperUDescription: I worked as a versatile employee at Super U in Valdoie for 2 months. I learned to work in a team, manage my time, and be autonomous.
MTUDescription: I spent a semester on Erasmus at MTU in Cork, Ireland, where I improved my English and continued my Computer Science studies.
NoobletyDescription0: Nooblety is an immersive game that transports you to a medieval universe set in Amboise during the Renaissance to the beginning of the Wars of Religion (1450 - 1574). You will start by playing as a young peasant, but your goal is to climb the social ladder to become a respected noble.
ParserDescription0: The project involves creating an API that generates UML diagrams from a Java package. The API can generate Class Diagrams of Abstract Class Type (DCA) and Concrete Class Type (DCC).
ApplicationCulinaireDescription0: This Windows Forms and .NET application allows users to search for cooking recipes, view them, modify them, and delete them. Recipes are stored in a SQL Server database. The application also allows managing ingredients and recipe categories.
SudokuSolverDescription0: This project is an online sudoku solver. It allows solving sudoku grids, generating them, and saving them. The solver uses a backtracking algorithm to solve the grids.
ForetEternelleDescription0: Forêt Éternelle is a 2D video game project launched in 2012 by a team of enthusiasts, with the aim of capturing the very essence of the Pokémon franchise in a unique experience. As a fangame, our ambition was to reconnect with the elements that made the series successful while offering a more mature approach and a deeply worked scenario.
ForetEternelleDescription1: I joined the team in 2023 as a Ruby developer. I worked on the combat system, quest system, and weather system.
MadeByMeTitle: This website was created by me
MadeByMe: This website was created exclusively with ReactJS, HTML, and CSS to provide a smooth and aesthetic user experience. Thanks to these modern technologies, I offer intuitive and responsive navigation. Moreover, this site is available in multiple languages and features a day/night mode for a personalized experience.
